## Input Payload
```json
{
  "field1": "string",
  "field2": "number",
  "field3": "boolean",
  "field4": {
    "subfield1": "string",
    "subfield2": "array"
  }
  // Add additional fields and validation requirements here
}
```

## Output Payload

```json
{
  "field1": "string",
  "field2": "number",
  "field3": "boolean",
  "field4": {
    "subfield1": "string",
    "subfield2": "array"
  }
  // Add additional fields and validation requirements here
}
```
